title: pkgbuild 1.4.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-06-14 New Config/build/extra-sources DESCRIPTION option make pkgbuild aware extra source files consider needs_compile(). New Config/build/bootstrap DESCRIPTION option. Set TRUE run Rscript bootstrap.R package root prior building source package (#157, @paleolimbot). pkgbuild now supports Rtools43. pkgbuild now always appends extra compiler flags ones already exist system /user Makevars files (#156).

title: pkgbuild 1.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-11-27 pkgbuild can now avoid copying large package directories building source package. See PKG_BUILD_COPY_METHOD environment variable ?build package README (#59). currently experimental feature, feedback appreciated. R CMD build warnings can now turned errors, setting pkg.build_stop_for_warnings option TRUE setting PKG_BUILD_STOP_FOR_WARNINGS environment variable true (#114). need_compile() now knows Rust source code files, .e. Cargo.toml *.rs (#115). Now pkgbuild::build() clean inst/doc default Config/build/clean-inst-doc entry DESCRIPTION set FALSE (#128). New PKG_BUILD_COLOR_DIAGNOSTICS environment variable opt colored compiler output (#141). pkgbuild now works full XCode installation XCode Command Line Tools installed, macOS, RStudio (#103).

title: pkgbuild 1.2.1

title: pkgbuild 1.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-12-15 pkgbuild now licensed MIT (#106) compile_dll() gains debug argument control compile options used (@richfitz, #100) pkgbuild_process() build() now use colored compiler diagnostics supported (#102) Avoid documentation link ambiguity R 4.1 (#105)

title: pkgbuild 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-07-13 compile_dll() now supports automatic cpp11 registration package links cpp11. rtools_needed returns correct version instead “custom” (@burgerga, #97)

title: pkgbuild 1.0.8
text: CRAN release: 2020-05-07 Fixes capability RStudio 1.2. Rtools 40, R 4.0.0

title: pkgbuild 1.0.7
text: CRAN release: 2020-04-25 Additional fixes Rtools 40

title: pkgbuild 1.0.6
text: CRAN release: 2019-10-09 Support RTools 40 custom msys2 toolchains explicitly set using CC Makevars (#40).

title: pkgbuild 1.0.5
text: CRAN release: 2019-08-26 check_build_tools() gains quiet argument, control message displayed. message longer displayed check_build_tools() called internally pkgbuild functions. (#83)

title: pkgbuild 1.0.4
text: CRAN release: 2019-08-05 build() gains clean_doc argument, control inst/doc directory cleaned building. (#79, #75) build() pkgbuild_process now standard output error correctly interleaved, redirecting standard error build process standard output (@gaborcsardi, #78). check_build_tools() now helpful error message points towards ways debug issue (#68). pkgbuild_process now set custom compiler flags, uses user’s Makevars file (@gaborcsardi, #76). rtools_path() now returns NA non-windows systems also works has_rtools() run previously (#74).

title: pkgbuild 1.0.3
text: CRAN release: 2019-03-20 Tests wrote package library now skipped CRAN. build() can now build tar.gz file directly (#55)

title: pkgbuild 1.0.2
text: CRAN release: 2018-10-16 build() compile_dll() gain register_routines argument, automatically register C routines tools::package_native_routines_registration_skeleton() (#50) build() now warn trying build packages R versions <= 3.4.2 Windows space R installation directory (#49) build() now message build contains long paths, unsupported windows (#48) compile_dll() longer doubles output, regression caused styling callback. (https://github.com/r-lib/devtools/issues/1877) build() output now styled like rcmdcheck package (https://github.com/r-lib/devtools/issues/1874). build() longer sets compile flags (#46)

title: pkgbuild 1.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2018-09-18 Preliminary support rtools 4.0 (#40) compile_dll() now supply compiler flags existing user defined Makevars file. local_build_tools() function added provide deferred equivalent with_build_tools(). can add rtools PATH end function body.

title: pkgbuild 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2018-06-27 Add metadata support Rtools 3.5 (#38). build() uses ---resave-data argument R CMD build --resave-data argument wasn’t supplied user (@theGreatWhiteShark, #26) build() now cleans existing vignette files inst/doc exist. (#10) clean_dll() also deletes symbols.rds created compile_dll() run inside R CMD check. First argument functions now path rather pkg.
